title: Stock assessment of the mud crab (Scylla olivacea) collected from the terrestrial edge of the Sundarbans mangrove forest, Bangladesh
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Md Kamrul Islam, Mohammad Mahfuzur Rahman, Md Hannanur Rahman, Zakia Jahan Shuchi, Mst Sharmin Nahar, Md Zahid Hasan, Ehsanul Bari, Md Sherazul Islam
